name: <io::buffered::bufreader::BufReader<R> as io::Read>::read_buf_exact

core::io::BorrowedCursor::<'a>::capacity.doc: Returns the available space in the cursor.

io::buffered::bufreader::buffer::Buffer:.doc:
If there are `amt` bytes available in the buffer, pass a slice containing those bytes to
 `visitor` and return true. If there are not enough bytes available, return false.
